attributes.additional_details:
Please watch this video as it shows the hidden truth of fracking https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dEB_Wwe-uBM&feature=youtu.be

Please sign the petition otherwise this is what will happen to the whole of the UK. Fracking has been known to harm drinking water, the environment so it may have been the future 100 years ago, however, we now have the technology to move to clean and green energy and we need to embrace that + its cheaper, whats not to love☺.
attributes.background: Fracking has been trialled in Australia and America, just look at how their lives changed for the worst with "FLAMMABLE WATER". It's a scary thought so please sign this petition otherwise we will all have the same problem.
